tool_description: Various tools to analyze and modify text.
name: Language Tools
title: Language Tools

api_list.name: /language
api_list.description: Gives the language of the given text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://language-tools.p.rapidapi.com/language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "language-tools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /sentiment
api_list.description: Gives the sentiment of the given text in a value between -1 and +1 and in a brief description.
